_88release.description: Levels at which participants or researchers may choose to share data.
_88release.title: sharing release level

_88container.description: Organizational unit within volume containing related files (with common annotations), often corresponding to an individual data session (single visit/acquisition/participant/group/day).
_88container.title: session or materials

___assets.description: Attachment point of assets, which, in the case of timeseries data, should match asset.duration.

$eref.description: Assets reflecting files in primary storage.
$eref.title: file

___options.description: Additional transcode options to pass to ffmpeg.

___replace.description: Original file staging path or asset id to replace.

___clip.description: Portion of source file to extract as this asset. Note that segment is relative to clip start.

anyOf.description: Start point only (end point inferred from length).
Automatically postioned immediately following previous positioned asset.

___release.description: Sharing/release permissions granted by participants on (portions of) contained data.

$eref.description: Levels at which participants or researchers may choose to share data.
$eref.title: sharing release level

$eref.description: Sets of metadata measurements organized into or applying to a single cohesive unit. These are assumed to be unique within a volume, such that two identical records are considered the same object.

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

___category.description: Types of records that are relevant for data organization.

_88offset.description: Point in time in milliseconds or MM:SS.sss, used as endpoint for segment.  Null represents indeterminate value, usually representing +-Infinity as an endpoint.
